wikipedia_page.main: Sir Joseph Dobbie (1862 – 18 May 1943) was a British Liberal Party politician.

response: *Joseph Dobbie, Liberal MP for Ayr Burghs (UK Parliament constituency) from 1904 to 1906

The local Liberal Association selected 42-year-old Joseph Dobbie as their candidate to gain the seat. He was educated at the Ayr Academy and the University of Edinburgh and was in favour of social reform.
*Joseph Dobbie, For public and local services in Edinburgh.
